name: Angel Heart

30.name: Thunderstroke
30.description: Deals an extra 100% DMG to 2 enemies

90.name: Twilight
90.description: ATK+10%, CRIT+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, and friends battle)

description: In a despicable person's eyes, Angel Heart is a dangerous thing; For a kind-hearted person, Angel Heart can be a sharp sword in his hand and slay the despicable souls.
